
# ECOMMERCE WEBSITE

A brief description of how this project done.

## Project Deploy Link

https://65ef0ddff0eed85b974a3028--harmonious-cobbler-2749ab.netlify.app/


## Features of Website

- Classic Nav Bar
- Live previews
- Signin and Signup options
- Add to cart option 
- Selecting Items


## ðŸ”— Project Link (GITHUB)

https://github.com/Varun-Prabhakar/Ecommerce.git




## Installation

Install my-project with npm

```bash
  npm install my-project
  cd my-project
```
    
## License

[Netlify](https://app.netlify.com/sites/harmonious-cobbler-2749ab/overview)


## Used Swiftsafe Logo in Website

![Logo](data:image/png;base64,)


## Running Tests

To run tests, run the following command

```bash
  npm run test
```


## Technologies Covered
- Reactjs
- Tailwindcss
- Redux-Toolkit 
- Javascript
- HTML
- CSS

## Steps of Building Project

- Firstly Started with Navbar
- Next build the interface of the Project
- Divided the need of pages in the project 
- Separated and designed every page of the project 
- Added some comment lines to the code for the purpose of Clarity
- Finally Joined every page and made a perfect output of the project
